^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ClearAccumulatedUtilizationCounters.description: The action sets the values of AccumulatedGPUContextUtilizationDuration and AccumulatedSMUtilizationDuration properties to zero.
ClearAccumulatedUtilizationCounters.longDescription: This action sets the values of AccumulatedGPUContextUtilizationDuration and AccumulatedSMUtilizationDuration properties to zero.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.Normal: The value is within the range
enumDescriptions.OutOfRange: The value is outside the range

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AccumulatedGPUContextUtilizationDuration.description: The duration of the accumulated GPU context utilization.
AccumulatedGPUContextUtilizationDuration.longDescription: This property shall contain the duration of the accumulated GPU context utilization.  This value can accumulate only with the driver loaded, and is reset when an SBR reset, a fundamental reset, or after a ClearAccumulatedUtilizationCounters action.  This property reports utilization duration up to approximately 49 days of activity and will roll over to zero.

AccumulatedSMUtilizationDuration.description: The duration of the accumulated SM utilization.
AccumulatedSMUtilizationDuration.longDescription: This property shall contain the duration of the accumulated SM utilization.  This value can accumulate only with the driver loaded, and is reset when an SBR reset, a fundamental reset, or after a ClearAccumulatedUtilizationCounters action.  This property reports utilization duration up to approximately 49 days of activity and will roll over to zero.

DMMAUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain DMMA utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

EDPViolationState.longDescription: This property shall contain the EDP violation state for this resource.

FP16ActivityPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain FP16 activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

FP32ActivityPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain FP32 activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

FP64ActivityPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain FP64 activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

GlobalSoftwareViolationThrottleDuration.description: The total duration of throttling caused by global software violation of the processor since reset.
GlobalSoftwareViolationThrottleDuration.longDescription: This property shall contain the total duration of throttling caused by global software violation of the processor since reset.

GraphicsEngineActivityPercent.description: Graphics engine activity as a percentage.
GraphicsEngineActivityPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain graphics engine activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

HMMAUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain HMMA utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

HardwareViolationThrottleDuration.description: The total duration of throttling caused by hardware violation of the processor since reset.
HardwareViolationThrottleDuration.longDescription: This property shall contain the total duration of throttling caused by hardware violation of the processor since reset.

IMMAUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain IMMA utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

IntergerActivityUtilizationPercent.description: Interger activity utilization as a percentage.
IntergerActivityUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain Integer activity utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

MemoryPageRetirementCount.longDescription: This property shall contain memory page retirement count.

MemorySpareChannelPresence.description: The memory spare channel presence state.
MemorySpareChannelPresence.longDescription: This property shall indicate memory spare channel is presence for this processor.

NVDecInstanceUtilizationPercent.description: An array of NvDEC instance utilization as a percentage.
NVDecInstanceUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of NvDEC instance utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

NVDecUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain NvDec utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

NVJpgInstanceUtilizationPercent.description: An array of NvJPG instance utilization as a percentage.
NVJpgInstanceUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of NvJPG instance utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

NVJpgUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain NvJPG utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

NVLinkDataRxBandwidthGbps.description: The current bandwidth received on NVLink without protocol overhead.
NVLinkDataRxBandwidthGbps.longDescription: This property shall contain the current bandwidth received on NVLink without protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).

NVLinkDataTxBandwidthGbps.description: The current bandwidth transferred on NVLink without protocol overhead.
NVLinkDataTxBandwidthGbps.longDescription: This property shall contain the current bandwidth transferred on NVLink without protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).

NVLinkRawRxBandwidthGbps.description: The current bandwidth received on NVLink with protocol overhead.
NVLinkRawRxBandwidthGbps.longDescription: This property shall contain the current bandwidth received on NVLink with protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).

NVLinkRawTxBandwidthGbps.description: The current bandwidth transferred on NVLink with protocol overhead.
NVLinkRawTxBandwidthGbps.longDescription: This property shall contain the current bandwidth transferred on NVLink with protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).

NVOfaUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain NvOFA utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

PCIeRXBytes.description: The total number of bytes received by the PCIe receiver.
PCIeRXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of bytes received by the PCIe receiver.

PCIeRawRxBandwidthGbps.description: The current bandwidth received on PCIe with protocol overhead.
PCIeRawRxBandwidthGbps.longDescription: This property shall contain the current bandwidth received on PCIe with protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).

PCIeRawTxBandwidthGbps.description: The current bandwidth transferred on PCIe with protocol overhead.
PCIeRawTxBandwidthGbps.longDescription: This property shall contain the current bandwidth transferred on PCIe with protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).

PCIeTXBytes.description: The total number of bytes sent by the PCIe transmitter.
PCIeTXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of bytes sent by the PCIe transmitter.

PerformanceState.longDescription: This property shall contain the performance state value for this resource.

PowerBreakPerformanceState.longDescription: This property shall contain the power break performance state value for this resource.

SMActivityPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain SM activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

SMOccupancyPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain SM occupancy as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the warps by the maximum warps.

SMUtilizationPercent.description: The SM utilization utilization as a percentage.
SMUtilizationPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the SM utilization of the processor as a percentage.

TensorCoreActivityPercent.description: Tensor core activity as a percentage.
TensorCoreActivityPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain tensor core activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.

ThrottleReasons.description: The throttle reasons for this processor.
ThrottleReasons.longDescription: The property shall contain a list of throttle reasons for this processor.

enumDescriptions.Degraded: The entity is operating at a degraded functional level
enumDescriptions.Normal: The entity is operating at a full functional level at full speed
enumDescriptions.Throttled: The entity is operating at a full functional level at reduced speed

title: #NvidiaProcessorMetrics.v1_3_0
